Entry.JapaneseText: 「ド」が付くほど暑い街だぜ…… よくこんなところに住んでるもんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's so freakin' hot in this town... How can people even live here...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… 汗が……止まらない……
なんだ、<Veigue>も暑いのが 苦手なのかよ……
Entry.EnglishText: What, you can't handle the heat either?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スールズでここまで 暑くなる日はないからな……
Entry.EnglishText: There's never been a day as hot as this in Sulz...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……いや、これは<Purple>暑い<White>を 通り越している……ふぅ……
Entry.EnglishText: Actually, this goes above and beyond <Purple>hot<White>... Whew...
